UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: A novel synthetic peptide from a tomato defensin exhibits antibacterial activities against Helicobacter pylori.
Literature.Author: Rigano MM, Romanelli A, Fulgione A, Nocerino N, D'Agostino N, Avitabile C, Frusciante L, Barone A, Capuano F, Capparelli R

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=270 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus A170(MIC=40µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=40µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes(MIC=40µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi A(MIC=15µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=15µg/ml),Helicobacter pylori(MIC=15µg/ml),Helicobacter pylori(MIC=10µg/ml),Helicobacter pylori(MIC=12µg/ml),Human acute monocytic leukemia THP-1(no activity data),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum(10-20% Inhibition=50µg/ml),Lacticaseibacillus paracasei(10-20% Inhibition=50µg/ml)
